metadata.name: SHADOW
metadata.description:
This collection is about people, who were raised only by mother. This is a big issue for post USSR countries. Personaly I have only mom, I have never seen my dad. I know how this affects on mind of child. We are diffirent. We are very sensitive. But we are independent.

I asked people, who don't have a father, to take a mother's sweater and be in it on photos.
